page.title: 07 THE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: There are three different councils,the{Parish Council,}the {District Council}and the{County {Council.}Our district is called {Tandridge}and our parish is called {Nutfield. The County Council } sees to Education Centres,libraries, housing and parks etc{ .The District {Council}sees to Markets,cemetries , plans for housing,parks and gypsy sites.{The Parish Council}arranges burial grounds, public clocks,bus shelters,footpaths and allotments. The{Nutfield Parish Council}has 10 people on it and the chairperson is{Mrs Janis Adams. The Parish {Council}also deals with complaints like, why aren't the street lights working?{ Our Parish Council}has been recently talking about the noise the aerodrome makes,the Scout Hut and our roads and pavements.
